title: Lara Croft GO + The Mirror of Spirits
body:
Lara Croft GO + The Mirror of Spirits


Genres/Tags: Logic, Puzzle, Isometric, 3D, Turn-based
Companies: Square Enix Montreal / Square Enix
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 1.4 GB
Repack Size: 355 MB

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Lara.Croft.GO.The.Mirror.of.Spirits-CODEX ISO release: codex-lara.croft.go.the.mirror.of.spirits.iso (1454309376 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • You can install either x86 or x64 version of the game
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 1.4 GB to 355 MB)
  • Installation takes less than a minute
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 1 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language

Game Description

Lara Croft GO is a turn based puzzle-adventure set in a long-forgotten world. Explore the ruins of an ancient civilization, discover well-kept secrets and face deadly challenges as you uncover the myth of the Queen of Venom.

Following the award-winning Hitman GO, Square Enix Montreal brings yet another beloved franchise to consoles with this unique take on the iconic heroine’s adventures.

Game Features

  • Experience lush visuals and a captivating soundtrack
  • Fight menacing enemies, overcome dangerous obstacles and escape deadly traps
  • Collect ancient relics and unlock new outfits for Lara

This repack IS NOT compatible with initial one.
